jobDescription: HotelTonight makes it remarkably easy to book great hotels at amazing last-minute rates on your mobile device, for tonight, tomorrow and beyond. Leveraging this data in the right way is what will differentiate HotelTonight and make it the leading hotel booking app on the planet. Thats where you come in.As the only Data Scientist on the Engineering team, you will work closely with leaders across Product and Engineering to drive business decisions using data.
